text: Welcome to the Reflect and Move Forward habit, a set of personal reflection and supportive team sharing exercises.
How do you acknowledge accomplishments and reward success?
Repeat yesterday’s Team Activity on how you acknowledge accomplishments and reward success.
Progress can be measured in several meaningful ways.
See today’s activity attached information for examples of successful behavior goals and share some of your own with the team.
Change how you view and measure a habit’s success to one that’s a bit saner and self-compassionate.
Repeat yesterday’s activity on measuring a habits’ success using exercise as an example and share with the team.
See today’s activity attached information for new examples of subtle behavior changes and share some of your own with the team.
Mastering habits. How does it happen for you and what conditions need to be in place?
Mastering a new habit can give you the space and energy needed to reduce the frequency of undesirable behaviors.
Learn how to spot improvements in your desired behaviors and mindset and then share with the team.
See today’s activity attached information for new information on mastering habits using examples from the Eat Protein Early and Often habit and share with the team.
Share with the team any last minute thoughts or experiences you’ve had while in the program.
The Reflect and Move Forward team sharing habit ends today. Read the wrap-up in today’s activity attached information and learn about your next challenge.
